title: Hey i won lane vs a Vayne.
body:
too bad she gonna R-Q me for half my hp and force me out of the teamfight instantly with RFC proc.

And you know what's even funnier aside the fact that she can safely do that? 
wait for it.
Wait wait wait...

I CANNOT SEE HER TO RETALIATE BEFORE I'M 50% HP 
POGGERS ( screams in OddOne )
Oh did i mention there is NO way to dodge autoattacks? 
POGGERS.

replies.body: Why isn't she CC'd and blown up?
Because most cc is skillshots which are very easy to dodge when you have a mobility spell on a 2 second cooldown (without any cdr). Even if they are targeted abilities, stealth makes you intargetable
Yeah, that's pretty cool when you have a chance to counter pick.

> Oh did i mention there is NO way to dodge autoattacks?

{{item:2419}}
{{champion:24}}  bish pls.
Jax currently bugged, can't dodge dem enhanced autos/apply on hit effects {{champion:75}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:41}}etc. xd.

Well , that applies only if you are adc or mage , Assassins and Fighters can easily kill her 1 vs 1 , and no matter how many times they nerf her , she still needs more nerfs , or more like a rework , she really needs a rework

Vayne is such a fair and balanced champion, that Riot wants to make another ADC like based on Vayne's gameplay. Probably so people will complain about the new Vayne ADC and forget about the old Vayne ADC.
She has Draven's Q and Kha'Zix's ult on steroid, while also having Yasuo's mobility and Tristana's ult on a basic ability. Yup, seems fine.

It's almost like ADCs have this thing called lifesteal that allows you to get your health back. I also hear of these magical players called supports that are able to shield and heal as well as CC someone like vayne who has to low range post her RFC proc. Go figure.

> [{quoted}](name=Kaioko,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3bwFL4QJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-02-07T17:16:06.405+0000)
>
> It's almost like ADCs have this thing called lifesteal that allows you to get your health back. I also hear of these magical players called supports that are able to shield and heal as well as CC someone like vayne who has to low range post her RFC proc. Go figure.

I heard there is this little thign that is called uncounterable stealth every 3 seconds. I also heard that the Vayne has a shield slave aswell!.
Did i mention that you cannot go near a fight after you get auto'd once because tanks can kill you from 70%? ( this isnt defending adc this is a problem for every semi squishy champ ) Oh did i also mention that by the time i get to lifesteal she has 6hitted my frontliner because she procs W for 300-400 true dmg? Oh i'm sorry i didnt.
you also forget extra movespeed from fleet every 2 seconds

Vayne is sub 50% wr now.

Shes not even tier 1 anymore, you're complaining about a tier 2 at best adc.

Ryze has a low winrate and he is fucking disgusting. Winrates dont mean balance.

Not to fucking mention Vayne has one of the lowest skillcap playerbases especially macro whise and they tend to throw more games than Riven and Yasuo playerbases combined.

because.

Tristana is a ranged Kha'zix on steroids and more burst.
Jinx? Lawl ranged aoe crits nothing more to talk about.

So yeah ofc she gonna be weaker than the rest marksman cast because you know. THE ENTIRE ROLE IS BROKEN.
Outside Draven because riot breaks his knee caps eveerytime he comes out because he is a solo carry champion and JHIN because they also don't like him for some reason.

you should check this out: [for Marksmen to be a healthier class, Riot should flesh out their gameplay niche](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/lT3B52ki-in-my-opinion-for-marksmen-to-be-a-healthier-class-riot-should-flesh-out-their-gameplay-niche?comment=0043)

Doesnt matter if you heal, use zhonyah or play as jax. 3 procs and you are dead, bottom line. if you can even make it that far as a squishy. She is supposed to be able to shred a tank. So if vayne free hitting your tank is pretty much cutting away at their health like a top chef choping ingredients at a 5 star restaurant. Your adc is pretty much the equivalent of what happens when you put something in a blender max settings.

"I won lane against vayne"
see that's a good joke

Trist beats her straight up until 3 items, ezreal beats her until 3 itesm, draven beats her, Lucian beats her, kog beats her, kalista beats her. Until 3 items vayne is hands down the worst adc in the game.
Rengar player qq about stealth and aa damage lmao. Vayne is shit teir right now.

A bit over the top but I agree with the sentiment. Vayne isn't very interactive for opponents. She is low range but that's about it. Her kit gives her a lot of tools that don't give opponents a fair opportunity to out-play her in all-out teamfights. Once she reaches late-game there's just nothing you can do short of bursting her before fights break out.

A champion's counterplay should not be relegated to just, "prevent them from reaching late-game." That simply creates a dichotomy of the player having a horrible experience early-game and then that horrible experience being transferred to their opponents once the game reaches late-game.
